books.title: They Both Die At The End
books.author: Adam Silvera
books.summary: Mateo and Rufus are total strangers, but, for different reasons, they're both looking to make a new friend on their End Day. The good news: There's an app for that. It's called the Last Friend, and through it, Rufus and Mateo are about to meet up for one last great adventureâ€”to live a lifetime in a single day.

books.title: Project Hail Mary
books.author: Andy Weir
books.summary: Ryland Grace wakes up disoriented on a spaceship drifting millions of miles from Earth, with no memory of how he got there or what his mission is. As he reconstructs his fragmented memories, he discovers that he is the sole crew member on a desperate mission to save the sun from mysteriously diminishing.

books.title: Murder on the Orient Express
books.author: Agatha Christie
books.summary: Just after midnight, a snowdrift stops the luxurious Orient Express on its journey from Istanbul to London. The opulent train is now isolated, and an American tycoon lies dead in his compartment, stabbed multiple times. Poirot, a renowned detective aboard the train, volunteers to solve the murder before the train resumes its journey.

books.title: Circe
books.author: Madeline Miller
books.summary: In the timeless world of Greek myth, Circe, the daughter of a powerful Titan and a nymph, is cast out to a deserted island for defying the gods. With her knowledge of herbs and forbidden magic, Circe transforms her exile into a kingdom, ruling over fantastical creatures and encountering famous heroes and mythical beings from Odysseus to Jason.

books.title: The Song of Achilles
books.author: Madeline Miller
books.summary: Achilles, the fierce warrior of Greek myth, is young, handsome, and gifted. Patroclus is an awkward young prince ostracized by his family. Their fates are intertwined when Patroclus is exiled to Achilles' court. What starts as a friendship blossoms into a love that will endure through life and death.

books.title: Intermezzo
books.author: Sally Rooney
books.summary: Two former lovers, a writer and an editor, reconnect after several years apart. As they reminisce and explore their current lives, they must grapple with unresolved feelings and the possibility of rekindling their relationship.

books.title: Palace of the Peacock
books.author: Wilson Harris
books.summary: Set in the Guyanese rainforest, Palace of the Peacock explores themes of identity, memory, and the relationship between the human world and the natural world. The narrative is fragmented and dreamlike, challenging readers to actively participate in the creation of meaning.

books.title: The Dispossessed
books.author: Ursula K. Le Guin
books.summary: Shevek, a physicist from the anarchist moon of Anarres, travels to the capitalist world of Urras. There, he encounters a society with stark contrasts to his own, facing challenges that force him to question his ideals and the possibility of utopia.

books.title: The Lying Life of Adults
books.author: Elena Ferrante
books.summary: Giovanna, a twelve-year-old girl in Naples, becomes obsessed with the disappearance of her beloved father

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.summary: In the quiet English countryside, the wealthy Mr. Bingley and his sisters arrive at a new estate. Mrs. Bennet, determined to find suitable husbands for her five daughters, sets her sights on Mr. Bingley for her eldest, Jane. However, misunderstandings and social barriers complicate the course of romance.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.summary: Scout Finch, a young girl growing up in the Deep South during the Great Depression, observes the trial of a black man accused of assaulting a white woman. Through her innocent eyes, we witness the complexities of racism and prejudice in a segregated society.

books.author: George Orwell
books.summary: Set in a totalitarian state, 1984 follows the life of Winston Smith, a low-ranking government employee who begins to question the oppressive regime and its constant surveillance.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.summary: Set in the Jazz Age, the novel explores themes of wealth, class, love, and the American Dream through the eyes of Nick Carraway, who is drawn into the opulent world of his mysterious neighbor, Jay Gatsby.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.summary: A young hobbit, Frodo Baggins, inherits a simple ring and finds himself embroiled in a perilous quest to destroy it in the fires of Mount Doom, before the Dark Lord Sauron reclaims it.

books.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
books.author: Delia Owens
books.summary: A quiet girl, raised alone in the marsh, becomes a suspect in the murder of a popular boy. As the story unfolds, we learn about her life, her love for nature, and the secrets she harbors.

books.title: It Ends With Us
books.author: Colleen Hoover
books.summary: A love story between Lily and Ryle, a neurosurgeon, is complicated by Lily's past and the toxic patterns she struggles to break free from.

books.title: The Silent Patient
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.summary: Alia, a famous painter, stops speaking after a shocking act of violence. Theo Faber, a forensic psychotherapist, becomes obsessed with understanding her silence and unraveling the truth behind the tragedy.

books.title: The Guest List
books.author: Lucy Foley
books.summary: A glamorous wedding on a remote island turns deadly when a storm cuts off all escape routes and a shocking murder takes place.

books.title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.summary: Aging Hollywood star Evelyn Hugo chooses a young, unknown journalist to reveal the truth about her glamorous life, her seven marriages, and the secrets she's kept for decades.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.summary: Set on the desert planet Arrakis, Dune follows the story of Paul Atreides, a young noble whose family is given control of the planet. As he navigates political intrigue, ecological challenges, and a powerful drug called Spice, Paul's destiny intertwines with the fate of the universe.

books.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
books.author: Douglas Adams
books.summary: Arthur Dent, an ordinary man, finds his life turned upside down when Earth is demolished to make way for a hyperspace bypass. With the help of his eccentric friend Ford Prefect, he embarks on a hilarious and often absurd journey through the cosmos.

books.title: The Hunger Games
books.author: Suzanne Collins
books.summary: In the dystopian nation of Panem, two teenagers from District 12, Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark, are selected to compete in the annual Hunger Games, a televised event where young tributes fight to the death.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.summary: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones, focusing on small, incremental changes that lead to significant results.

books.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.summary: A sweeping history of humankind from the Stone Age to the Information Age, exploring our species' unique abilities and their impact on the world.

books.title: Think and Grow Rich
books.author: Napoleon Hill
books.summary: A classic self-help book that explores the principles of success, including thought, desire, faith, and persistence.

books.title: Man's Search for Meaning
books.author: Viktor Frankl
books.summary: A memoir of Viktor Frankl's experiences as a prisoner in Nazi concentration camps and his exploration of the human will to survive and find meaning in even the most horrific circumstances.

books.title: Quiet: The Power of Introverts in a World That Can't Stop Talking
books.author: Susan Cain
books.summary: An exploration of the strengths and challenges faced by introverted individuals, advocating for a better understanding and appreciation of quiet personalities.

books.title: The Fault in Our Stars
books.author: John Green
books.summary: A heart-wrenching love story between two teenagers, Hazel Grace Lancaster and Augustus Waters, who meet in a cancer support group and navigate the complexities of life, love, and loss.

books.title: Divergent
books.author: Veronica Roth
books.summary: In a future Chicago divided into five factions, Beatrice Prior discovers that she doesn't fit into any of them and must choose a new path that could lead to danger and rebellion.

books.title: The Midnight Library
books.author: Matt Haig
books.summary: A heartwarming and philosophical novel about a woman who has the chance to explore infinite possibilities of her life.

books.title: The Invisible Life of Addie Larue
books.author: V.E. Schwab
books.summary: A historical fantasy novel about a woman cursed with immortality, who spends centuries longing for connection.

books.title: Tomorrow, and Tomorrow, and Tomorrow
books.author: Gabrielle Zevin
books.summary: A heartwarming story about two lifelong friends who create video games together.

books.title: The Night Shift
books.author: Alex Finlay
books.summary: A suspenseful thriller that follows a group of night shift workers who become entangled in a dangerous mystery.

books.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
books.author: Alexandre Dumas
books.summary: A classic tale of revenge and redemption, where a wrongly imprisoned man escapes and returns to seek justice against those who betrayed him.

books.title: Caraval
books.author: Stephanie Garber
books.summary: A magical and dangerous competition where Scarlett Dragna must navigate a treacherous world to find her sister and win the game.

books.title: Legendary
books.author: Stephanie Garber
books.summary: Tella Dragna enters Caraval to uncover dangerous secrets about her mother and makes a deal with the mysterious and deadly Prince of Hearts.

books.title: Finale
books.author: Stephanie Garber
books.summary: The final game unfolds, where sisters Scarlett and Tella must fight for their lives and find love, balancing hope and heartbreak.

books.title: Once Upon a Broken Heart
books.author: Stephanie Garber
books.summary: Evangeline Fox makes a dangerous bargain with the Prince of Hearts to mend her broken heart, thrusting her into a world of magic and curses.

books.title: The Ballad of Never After
books.author: Stephanie Garber
books.summary: Evangeline must navigate her feelings for the cursed Prince of Hearts while unraveling deadly secrets that could change the fate of their world.

books.title: A Curse for True Love
books.author: Stephanie Garber
books.summary: The epic conclusion to Evangeline and Jacks' story, where curses, betrayals, and true love converge in a race against destiny.

books.title: The Goldfinch
books.author: Donna Tartt
books.summary: A young boyâ€™s life changes forever when a tragedy leaves him with a priceless painting and a web of intrigue spanning years.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.summary: The witty and spirited Elizabeth Bennet navigates society, family, and her feelings for the seemingly arrogant Mr. Darcy.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.summary: A powerful exploration of racial injustice in the American South, seen through the eyes of a young girl named Scout Finch.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.summary: The story of the mysterious Jay Gatsby and his love for Daisy Buchanan, set in the opulence of the Roaring Twenties.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.summary: Holden Caulfield's rebellious journey through New York City, dealing with loss, isolation, and the complexities of adulthood.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.summary: A young shepherd named Santiago travels from Spain to Egypt in search of treasure, discovering his personal legend along the way.

books.title: The Night Circus
books.author: Erin Morgenstern
books.summary: An enchanting circus that appears without warning becomes the stage for a magical duel between two young magicians, whose destinies are intertwined.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.summary: Set in the distant future, young Paul Atreides navigates political intrigue and mysticism on the desert planet Arrakis, the only source of the universeâ€™s most valuable substance.

books.title: Jane Eyre
books.author: Charlotte BrontÃ«
books.summary: The story of an orphaned young woman who becomes a governess, finding love and independence despite the hardships and secrets of Thornfield Hall.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.summary: Bilbo Baggins, a simple hobbit, is swept into an epic quest to reclaim the lost Dwarf Kingdom of Erebor from the dragon Smaug.

books.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.summary: An exploration of the history of humankind, from the Stone Age to the modern era, examining how biology and culture have shaped our world.

books.title: Educated
books.author: Tara Westover
books.summary: A memoir of a woman who grows up in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho but eventually escapes to learn about the wider world through education.

books.title: The Power of Now
books.author: Eckhart Tolle
books.summary: A spiritual guide that emphasizes the importance of living in the present moment to find peace and enlightenment, drawing from various spiritual traditions.

books.title: Becoming
books.author: Michelle Obama
books.summary: The former First Lady shares the experiences that shaped her, from her childhood in Chicago to her years in the White House.

books.title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
books.author: Mark Manson
books.summary: A counterintuitive approach to living a good life, encouraging readers to embrace challenges and focus on what truly matters.

books.title: Outliers: The Story of Success
books.author: Malcolm Gladwell
books.summary: An analysis of the factors that contribute to high levels of success, from culture and family to timing and opportunities.

books.title: The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks
books.author: Rebecca Skloot
books.summary: The true story of Henrietta Lacks, whose cells were used for scientific breakthroughs without her consent, exploring the ethical issues of scientific research.

books.title: Quiet: The Power of Introverts in a World That Can't Stop Talking
books.author: Susan Cain
books.summary: A compelling argument about the value of introverts, how society undervalues them, and why the world needs their unique skills and perspectives.

books.title: The Body: A Guide for Occupants
books.author: Bill Bryson
books.summary: A fascinating tour of the human body, exploring how it works and the marvels and mysteries of our biological makeup.

books.title: The Cruel Prince
books.author: Holly Black
books.summary: Jude, a mortal girl, is swept into the dangerous and seductive world of Faerie, where she must defy and outmaneuver cruel faeries to find her place at the High Court.

books.title: The Wicked King
books.author: Holly Black
books.summary: As the power dynamics of the Faerie world shift, Jude must stay one step ahead of her enemies and her own emotions as she navigates the politics of the High Court.

books.title: The Queen of Nothing
books.author: Holly Black
books.summary: Exiled and betrayed, Jude returns to the Faerie realm to reclaim her power, confront old enemies, and battle for her future in a final showdown.

books.title: How the King of Elfhame Learned to Hate Stories
books.author: Holly Black
books.summary: A beautifully illustrated collection of tales following Cardan, the High King of Elfhame, as he recalls pivotal moments from his past and reflects on the love and hatred that shaped him.

menu.name: Latte
menu.description: Espresso with steamed milk and foam

menu.name: Cappuccino
menu.description: Espresso with steamed milk and foam, with more foam than a latte

menu.name: Mocha
menu.description: Espresso, steamed milk, chocolate syrup, and foam

menu.name: Iced Latte
menu.description: Espresso with cold milk and foam over ice

menu.name: Almond Croissant
menu.description: Croissant filled with almond paste and topped with sliced almonds

menu.name: Pride and Prejudice
menu.description: A delicate blend of Earl Grey tea, honey, and lemon

menu.name: Wonderland
menu.description: A cozy blend of espresso, steamed milk, and cinnamon, topped with a sprinkle of cinnamon

menu.name: The Alchemist
menu.description: A rich, dark roast coffee inspired by the journey of self-discovery. Bold and flavorful, with a hint of caramel.

menu.name: The Mortal Instruments
menu.description: A mysterious blend of dark roast coffee with hints of vanilla and almond, perfect for a night of shadowhunting. Topped with whipped cream and a dusting of cocoa powder.

menu.name: Caraval
menu.description: A magical blend of espresso, steamed milk, and lavender syrup, topped with a sprinkle of edible glitter. A truly enchanting drink.

menu.name: Enchanted Butterbeer
menu.description: A magical blend of creamy butterscotch, vanilla, and a hint of pumpkin spice, topped with whipped cream and a sprinkle of cinnamon sugar. A truly enchanting drink.

merch.name: Harry Potter Wand Replica
merch.description: A high-quality replica of a wand from the Harry Potter series.

merch.name: Hogwarts House Robe
merch.description: A cozy robe featuring the crest of your favorite Hogwarts house.

merch.name: Marauder's Map Print
merch.description: A high-quality print of the iconic Marauder's Map.

merch.name: Six of Crows Inspired Deck of Cards
merch.description: A deck of cards featuring the iconic characters and symbols from the Six of Crows duology.

merch.name: Grishaverse Enamel Pins
merch.description: A set of enamel pins featuring the symbols of the different Grisha powers.

merch.name: Shadowhunter Stele Necklace
merch.description: A delicate necklace featuring the iconic Shadowhunter stele symbol.

merch.name: Lightning Bolt Necklace
merch.description: A necklace featuring the iconic lightning bolt symbol of Percy Jackson.

merch.name: Camp Half-Blood T-Shirt
merch.description: A t-shirt with the Camp Half-Blood logo and a variety of camp-themed designs.

merch.name: Harry Potter Tote Bag
merch.description: A spacious and durable tote bag. Perfect for carrying books, groceries, or any other essentials.
